meter_reading.notes: Meter orientation check: BADGER METER text at top, digital display readable left-to-right. White digits (5 digits on left): 0 2 2 7 1 = 2271 m³. Black digit (single digit on right, separated): 2 = 0.2 m³. Red dial analysis: Dial orientation: '0' mark at top of dial, '5' mark at bottom of dial. Dial number scale position: pointing at 5, Clock position: 6 o'clock, Degrees: 180° (pointing DOWN), Verification: Hand is pointing DOWN ✓. Dial reading: 180/3600 = 0.050 m³. Total: 2271.25 m³. Image quality is somewhat blurry which affects precise dial reading, but main digits are readable.
